main event: Multiple UFO sightings were recorded in Chitose, Japan on various dates, including a white light ascending slowly and disappearing at sunrise, and objects of various shapes and sizes moving at fast speeds and changing course abruptly before disappearing.
interesting points: The white light sighted ascended slowly upward and disappeared when the sun rose, with no sound or trail observed.
There were reports of objects of various shapes and sizes, including circular, irregular, and silver objects, moving at different speeds and making abrupt course changes before disappearing.
One object was reported to have a lit interior and was flying in a straight course with no trail before disappearing toward the horizon in 30 seconds.
Some sightings involved a visual observer at a station, and one object remained visible for several hours, performing unknown maneuvers.
One circular object with white and blue lights, measuring 15 feet in diameter, moved very fast, changed course abruptly, and disappeared behind trees in 7-8 seconds.
sighted object: various UFOs of different shapes, including circular, irregular, and silver objects
witnesses: military agency, visual observers at a station, and various other individuals
